name: Puffy Flowers in Citron
description:
Our cards are handpainted, one-of-a-kind originals.

√ Browse the stationery.
√ Pick a sketch.
√ Personalize it, if you like.
√ We will paint it and send it right out!

Like this one? Cool.

We will turn this sketch into a handpainted original just for you. Get one for your friend. It is a chic note that will be enjoyed by the sender and the recipient!


* Made using high quality 80# matte card stock

* Measures 3 1/2" X 4 7/8"

* Post consumer waste and recycled fiber

* Set of 6

* Includes coordinating envelope - Citron

* Packaged in cello sleeve


I post one at a time, but if you would like more please convo me and I will be happy to post a special listing for you.

Usually ships within 4 days of receipt of payment. A confirmation will be sent with all details.

name: Browse Using Categories to the Right
Simplicity in Spa Blue
description:
From the inSaneity home decor collection of dms...

This pillow is made from 100% Italian, spa blue linen. It features a stunning, large-scale, handpainted, original flower in white.

Measures 16” x 16” with Polyfil insert for protection against allergy sensitivities. Please let me know if you would like a down/feather insert. Available for additional charge.

Pillow fabric available in a variety of colors.

Care:
Pillows have been treated to reduce stain damage. Should a spill occur, dab immediately with clean cloth. Spot clean. If necessary, hand wash in warm water using a mild detergent. Lay flat to dry. Iron on high while still damp. Use steam. Do not tumble or dry clean.

Experience inSaneity!

name: Red Burst on Butter
description:
From the inSaneity home decor collection of dms...

Warm red floral burst accents this buttery pillow. A perfect accent for spring and summer décor.
Made from 100% Italian linen, this pillow features a striking, large-scale, handpainted flower in red.

Measures 16” x 16” with Polyfil insert for protection against allergy sensitivities. Please let me know if you would like a down/feather insert. Available for an additional charge.

The pillow fabric is available in a variety of colors.

Care:
Pillows have been treated to reduce stain damage. Should a spill occur, dab immediately with clean cloth. Spot clean. If necessary, hand wash in warm water using a mild detergent. Lay flat to dry. Iron on high while still damp. Use steam. Do not tumble or dry clean.

Experience inSaneity!

name: Bird in Paradise
description:
From the inSaneity home decor collection of dms...

This accent pillow features a white silhouette of an exotic Bird of Paradise handpainted on warm red Italian linen.

Measures 12” x 18” with Polyfil insert for protection against allergy sensitivities. Please let me know if you would like a down/feather insert. Available for additional charge. Also available in 17 x 17 size.

Care:
Pillows have been treated to reduce stain damage. Should a spill occur, dab immediately with clean cloth. Spot clean. If necessary, hand wash in warm water using a mild detergent. Lay flat to dry. Iron on high while still damp. Use steam. Do not tumble or dry clean.


Experience inSaneity!
